$\log\frac{P_{n}\left(d_{i}|c_{j}\right)}{P_{n}\left(d_{i}|c_{j}\right)}=\sum_{k=1,\omega\in d_{i}}^{|V|}TF_{ik}.\log\frac{P_{n}\left(\omega_{k}|c_{j}\right)}{P_{n}\left(\omega_{k}|\bar{c_{j}}\right)}$
